Package cea.federated.server

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
cea.federated.server.ClientManager
public class ClientManager extends Object
Implementation of the manager of the clients proxies.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Map<Integer,ClientProxyGRPC>
    clients
    Map collection of (non-passive) clients proxies and their identifiers.
    Integer
    counterID
    Counter that generate unique ID each time a client connects to the server.
    Map<Integer,ClientProxyGRPC>
    passiveClients
    Map collection of passive clients proxies and their identifiers.

      public Map<Integer,ClientProxyGRPC> clients
      Map collection of (non-passive) clients proxies and their identifiers.

    • passiveClients

      public Map<Integer,ClientProxyGRPC> passiveClients
      Map collection of passive clients proxies and their identifiers.

    • counterID

      public Integer counterID
      Counter that generate unique ID each time a client connects to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientManager

      public ClientManager()
      Constructor of the client manager.

  • Method Details

    • create_client

      public ClientProxyGRPC create_client()
      Initializes a new client proxy.
      Returns:
      A new client proxy.

    • register

      public void register(ClientProxyGRPC client) throws Exception
      Registers a client proxy by adding it to its associated collection (normal or passive).
      Parameters:
      client - Client proxy that has just been created.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the ID of the client proxy already exists.

    • unregister

      public void unregister(Integer id, boolean isPassive) throws Exception
      Unregisters a client proxy by removing it of its associated collection (normal or passive).
      Parameters:
      id - Boolean that determines if the client is passive or not.
      isPassive - Identifier of the client proxy.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the ID of the client proxy doesn't exist.

    • sample_clients

      public List<ClientProxyGRPC> sample_clients(Integer n_clients, Integer min_n_clients)
      Randomly samples n_clients clients. If the clients collections has less than min_n_clients clients, it waits until enough clients have registered.
      Parameters:
      n_clients - Number of clients to sample.
      min_n_clients - Minimum number of clients required to run a sampling.
      Returns:
      A list of sampled clients proxies.

    • wait_for_client_messages

      public void wait_for_client_messages(List<ClientProxyGRPC> clients)
      Method used in the main server process, i.e. the 'Server' class file. Permits to pause the main process until all clients responses have been received.
      Parameters:
      clients - List of sampled clients proxies.

    • send_alert

      public void send_alert()
      Unblocks the sample_clients() method when a new client proxy has been registered.
